es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.flow
Class DiscriminatorFlow

java.lang.Object
  es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.SimulationObject
      es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.flow.BasicFlow
          es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.flow.SingleSuccessorFlow
              es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.flow.MergeFlow
                  es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.flow.ANDJoinFlow
                      es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.flow.DiscriminatorFlow
All Implemented Interfaces:
ANDJoinFlow, DiscriminatorFlow, FinalizerFlow, Flow, JoinFlow, MergeFlow, SingleSuccessorFlow, Identifiable, SimulationObject, java.lang.Comparable<SimulationObject>
public class DiscriminatorFlow
extends ANDJoinFlow
implements DiscriminatorFlow

An AND join flow which allows only the first true incoming branch to pass. It is reset when all the incoming branches are activated exactly once. Meets the Blocking Discriminator pattern (WFP28).

Author:
ycallero
